Title: Authorizes the release of certain records pertaining to deceased residents of OPWDD operated or certified facilities to family members
Summary: Authorizes the release of certain records pertaining to deceased residents of the office for people with developmental disabilities operated or certified facilities to family members.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.09, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to authorizing the release of certain records of deceased residents of OPWDD operated or certified facilities to family members upon written request
